name: FRANKFURTER_API__GET_LATEST_RATES
description: Fetches the latest foreign exchange rates. You can specify a base currency and one or more target currencies.

from.description: The three-letter currency code for the base currency (e.g., 'USD'). Defaults to EUR.

to.description: A comma-separated string of target currency codes (e.g., 'PKR,GBP,JPY'). If omitted, returns all currencies.

name: FRANKFURTER_API__CONVERT_CURRENCY
description: Converts a specific amount from one currency to another using the latest exchange rates.

amount.description: The amount of money to convert (e.g., 100).

from.description: The three-letter code of the currency you are converting from (e.g., 'USD').

to.description: The three-letter code of the currency you are converting to (e.g., 'PKR').

name: FRANKFURTER_API__GET_HISTORICAL_RATE
description: Fetches the historical exchange rates for a single, specific date.

path.description: Path parameters for the historical date.

date.description: The date for the historical rates in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2023-01-15').

query.description: Optional query parameters to filter the historical rates.

from.description: The base currency for the historical rate (e.g., 'USD').

to.description: A comma-separated string of target currency codes (e.g., 'PKR,GBP').

name: FRANKFURTER_API__GET_TIME_SERIES_RATES
description: Fetches historical exchange rates over a period of time. Use '..' to specify the range in the date parameter.

path.description: Path parameter for the date range.

date_range.description: The date range in YYYY-MM-DD..YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2023-01-01..2023-01-31').

query.description: Optional query parameters to filter the rates.

from.description: The base currency for the historical rates (e.g., 'USD').

to.description: A comma-separated string of target currency codes (e.g., 'PKR,GBP').

name: FRANKFURTER_API__LIST_SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES
description: Gets a list of all currency symbols and their full names supported by the API.
